solar system.description: Sun + 6 planets with realistic relative orbits

lagrange points.description: Sun–Jupiter system with L4/L5 Trojan asteroids

hohmann transfer.description: Spacecraft Hohmann transfer — Earth to Mars orbit

stellar flyby.description: Rogue star flyby disrupting a planetary system

roche limit.description: Moon fragmenting inside Roche limit — tidal disruption

slingshot.description: Spacecraft gravity assist around giant planet

kozai mechanism.description: Kozai-Lidov mechanism — outer binary pumping inner eccentricity

comet.description: Highly eccentric comet — fast at perihelion, slow at aphelion

asteroid belt.description: Main belt between Mars and Jupiter — Kirkwood gaps visible

double planet.description: Co-orbiting twin worlds around a common star

exoplanet system.description: Hot Jupiter in tight orbit + distant super-Earth

binary system.description: Equal-mass binary stars in circular orbit

contact binary.description: Contact binary — shared envelope, almost touching

eccentric binary.description: High eccentricity binary e≈0.7 — dramatic speed variation

black hole.description: Black hole with accretion disk particles

neutron star.description: Neutron star accreting from companion giant star

pulsar.description: Rapidly rotating pulsar with jet particles

white dwarf.description: White dwarf accreting from red giant companion

supernova remnant.description: Supernova expanding shell with neutron star core

protoplanetary disk.description: Young star with forming planets in disk

nebula.description: Stellar nursery — young star cluster forming

galaxy collision.description: Two spiral galaxies merging — tidal streams visible

star cluster.description: Open star cluster — loosely bound young stars

dark matter halo.description: Galaxy with flat rotation curve from dark matter halo

quasar.description: Quasar — supermassive black hole with relativistic jets

milky way core.description: Sgr A* supermassive black hole with S-star orbits
